projects.title: Retail Rover
projects.bodyText:
- Display a list of products fetched from an API.
 -  Product description, price, reviews, and specifications.
 - Add/remove products to/from the cart.
 - Adapt to different screen sizes for a seamless user experience.
 - Image gallery for product viewing.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.bodyText:
- Converted to a Progressive Web App (PWA) for offline use and better performance.
 - Minimized unnecessary re-rendering using React.memo and other optimization techniques.
 - Task creation, editing, deletion, and status management.
 - React.js for UI, Bootstrap 5 for styling.

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.bodyText:
- Easy addition of items to cartfor orders.
 -  Detailed menus with images, descriptions, and customization options for each dish.
 - Optimized for both mobile and desktop devices.
 - Animation apply for better user interface.
 - Menus and images are lazy-loaded to improve page load times.
